intro.p: The EventWiring Facility allows subscribers to connect to events exposed by publishers.

section.title: Introduction
section.p: With the EventWiring Facility you can use the configuration to connect component's methods (subscribers) to component's events (publishers).

section.title: Quick start
section.p: Just install the facility and add the proper configuration. You need to configure only subscribers.

section.title: Example
section.p: The class SimplePublisher exposes the event Event and we want to make the method OnPublishEvent on SimpleListener subscribe to this event. All we need to do is use the configuration:
section.pre:
<configuration>
<components>
<component id="publisher.component" type="Namespace.SimplePublisher, AssemblyName" />
<component id="listener.component" type="Namespace.SimpleListener, AssemblyName">
<subscribes> <subscribe-to publisher="SimplePublisher" event="Event" handler="OnPublish"/> </subscribes> </component>
</components>
<configuration>
section.p: The wiring will happen once the publisher component is created. We recommend that you use the Startable facility together with the EventWiring so you can start the publishers as soon as the components are ready.
